item.description: I know that I have suggested this location before and that this is very last minute, but if anyone would like to join Kyra and I for a morning stroll around the Hopedale Parklands, it's supposed to be nice out! I'll be starting out at the Little Red Shop on Hopedale St in Hopedale, MA at 10:30 AM...if you are free please join us! Leashes are required in the Parklands, and doggie bags are not provided.
item.name: Walk the Hopedale Parklands
